ygData.subject: Re: Patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Haven t messed with it since it was FIXED (snicker, maybe it is, but with Veran ts track record recently this brings a smile to my face). I think the lower
ygData.messageBody:
Haven't messed with it since it was "FIXED" (snicker, maybe it is, but with
Veran'ts track record recently this brings a smile to my face). I think the
lower level one affects the entire party and the higher one is targetted. I
don't know if the lower level one will strip beneficial buffs as well as
DoTs or disease/poison that may be on party members. If it does I can
definitely understand the upgrade to being targettable (sp?).

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan


>From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>, <EQ-Bards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch message
>Date: Wed, 1 Dec 1999 11:12:57 -0600
>
>
>greetings and forgive my ignorance but I have a question.
>
>What is the difference between the Level 22 Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
>and Level 40 ( they say now works) Syvelians Anti-Magic Aura?
>
>I think if I remember right level 22 song removes only like dot type
>negative effects on the party and 40th song removes from target one
>enchantment bad or good from target mob(or is it area?)
>
>
>Thanks Ahead of time
>
>Tuldar 40th song
>Tarew Marr
